\usepackage{hyperref}
\hypersetup{colorlinks=true}
\renewcommand{\baselinestretch}{0.9}
\makeatletter
  % sectionの下マージンを小さく
  \renewcommand{\section}{%
    \@startsection{section}{1}{\z@}%
    {0.4\Cvs}{0.1\Cvs}%
    {\normalfont\large\headfont\raggedright}}
\makeatother
